meanings.definition: To edit or revise something before it is officially published or released.
meanings.sent1: She preedits her essay to fix any mistakes before submitting it.
meanings.sent2: He always preedits his photos before posting them online.
meanings.sent3: The author preedits his novel to ensure it is error-free.
meanings.sent4: The teacher preedits the students' papers to help them improve their writing skills.
meanings.sent5: Before sending the email, she preedits it to avoid any misunderstandings.

meanings.definition: The act of making edits or revisions before finalizing a document or project.
meanings.sent1: Her preedits of the report helped catch several errors.
meanings.sent2: The preedits on the presentation made it more polished and professional.
meanings.sent3: The preedits on the script saved the team from embarrassing mistakes.
meanings.sent4: His preedits of the budget proposal were crucial for its success.
meanings.sent5: The preedits of the manuscript improved its overall quality.
